customerId.label: customerId
customerId.notProvided: The customerId field is required but was not provided.
customerId.invalidType: The customerId field does not contain valid data. This field must be a numeric value.

firstName.label: firstName
firstName.notProvided: The firstName field is required but was not provided.
firstName.invalidType: The firstName field does not contain valid data. This field must be a string value.
firstName.invalidLength: The firstName field is too long. This field must be no more than 50 bytes long.

lastName.invalidType: The lastName field does not contain valid data. This field must be a string value.
lastName.invalidLength: The lastName field is too long. This field must be no more than 50 bytes long.

addressId.invalidType: The addressId field does not contain valid data. This field must be a numeric value.
